titles.title: Authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee to notify the President of the assembly of the Congress.
Authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee to notify the President of the assembly of the Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution provides for appointment of a House of Representatives committee joined with a Senate committee to notify the President that a quorum of each chamber has assembled.
